label: Policy NCD_160_24
description: Policy rules for NCD_160_24

label: dbs_device_fda_approved_or_...
description: DBS devices must be Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approved or used in accordance with FDA approved protocols governing Category B Investigational Device Exemption (IDE) DBS clinical trials.

label: diagnosis_essential_tremor ...
description: Diagnosis of essential tremor (ET) based on postural or kinetic tremors of hand(s) without other neurologic signs.

label: tremor_causing_significant_...
description: Tremor causing significant limitation in daily activities despite optimal medical therapy.

label: diagnosis_idiopathic_parkin...
description: Diagnosis of idiopathic Parkinson's disease (PD) based on the presence of at least 2 cardinal PD features (tremor, rigidity or bradykinesia).

label: parkinsons_disease_tremor_d...
description: Parkinson's disease must be of a tremor-dominant form (for thalamic VIM DBS consideration).

label: diagnosis_idiopathic_parkin...
description: Diagnosis of idiopathic Parkinson's disease (PD) based on the presence of at least 2 cardinal PD features (tremor, rigidity or bradykinesia).

label: parkinsons_disease_persiste...
description: Persistent disabling Parkinson's symptoms or drug side effects (e.g., dyskinesias, motor fluctuations, or disabling 'off' periods) despite optimal medical therapy (for STN or GPi DBS consideration).

label: parkinsons_disease_minimum_...
description: Minimum number of cardinal Parkinson's disease features (tremor, rigidity, or bradykinesia) required for diagnosis.

label: parkinsons_disease_minimum_...
description: Minimum number of cardinal Parkinson's disease features (tremor, rigidity, or bradykinesia) required for diagnosis.

label: patient_willingness_coopera...
description: Patient's willingness and ability to cooperate during conscious operative procedure, as well as during post-surgical evaluations, adjustments of medications and stimulator settings.

label: patient_willingness_coopera...
description: Patient's willingness and ability to cooperate during conscious operative procedure, as well as during post-surgical evaluations, adjustments of medications and stimulator settings.

label: parkinsons_disease_advanced...
description: Field: parkinsons_disease_advanced_idiopathic_hoehn_yahr_updrs_criteria

label: parkinsons_disease_l_dopa_r...
description: Field: parkinsons_disease_l_dopa_responsive_with_on_periods

label: contraindication_non_idiopa...
description: DBS is not covered for non-idiopathic Parkinson's disease or 'Parkinson's Plus' syndromes.

label: contraindication_cognitive_...
description: Field: contraindication_cognitive_impairement_dementia_depression

label: contraindication_current_ps...
description: DBS is not covered for current psychosis, alcohol abuse or other drug abuse.

label: contraindication_structural...
description: DBS is not covered for structural lesions such as basal ganglionic stroke, tumor or vascular malformation as etiology of the movement disorder.

label: contraindication_previous_m...
description: DBS is not covered for previous movement disorder surgery within the affected basal ganglion.

label: contraindication_significan...
description: Field: contraindication_significant_medical_surgical_neurologic_orthopedic_comorbidities_dbs_contraindicated

label: neurosurgeon_properly_train...
description: Field: neurosurgeon_properly_trained_dbs

label: neurosurgeon_experience_sur...
description: Neurosurgeons must have experience with the surgical management of movement disorders, including DBS therapy.

label: operative_team_dbs_systems_...
description: Operative teams must have training and experience with DBS systems, including knowledge of anatomical and neurophysiological characteristics for localizing the targeted nucleus, surgical and/or implantation techniques for the DBS system, and operational and functional characteristics of the device.

label: hospital_brain_imaging_equi...
description: Hospital medical centers must have brain imaging equipment (MRI and/or CT) for pre-operative stereotactic localization and targeting of the surgical site(s).

label: hospital_operating_rooms_st...
description: Hospital medical centers must have operating rooms with all necessary equipment for stereotactic surgery.

label: hospital_support_services_c...
description: Hospital medical centers must have support services necessary for care of patients undergoing this procedure and any potential complications arising intraoperatively or postoperatively.

label: tremor_rating_scale_fahn_to...
description: Field: tremor_rating_scale_fahn_tolosa_marin_level

label: neurosurgeon_experience_ste...
description: Neurosurgeons must have experience performing stereotactic neurosurgical procedures.

label: movement_disorder_physician...
description: Physicians specializing in movement disorders must be involved in both patient selection and post-procedure care.
